messages.content: Saya ingin custom order dua Green Tea Latte dengan sirup Vanilla untuk Budi di VIP Room.
{"action": "custom_order", "data": {"customer_name": "Budi", "room_name": "VIP", "orders": [{"menu_name": "Green Tea Latte", "quantity": 2, "preference": "Vanilla", "notes": ""}]}}
